Detailed Description

Row chart implementaion of the ChartCommon class.

Creates a Row chart from the data in the supplied Poll object

ChartRow::getImageData (  $  sizeX,
$  sizeY
) 
 

Generate an image to show the poll, is outputtet when this method is called

Parameters:
$sizeX the width of the image to create
$sizeY the height of the image to create
Returns:
true on success, false on error, on error ChartCommon::isError() will return an Error object

Reimplemented from ChartCommon.
